carrier_review_title: How satisfied are you with carrier service?
product_review_title: How satisfied are you with the product?
package_review_title: How satisfied are you with packaging quality?
search_title: Please enter your tracking number, your order number or your email and get tracking results.
search_input_placeholder: Please enter your Tracking Number, Order Number or Your Email
description_no_info: A shipping label has been created, but the package has not yet been scanned and/or picked up by the carrier.
description_pre_transit: Carrier has received information about the package, but it has not yet been scanned and picked up.
description_delivery_in_progress: The package has reached the local area and is in the process of being delivered.
description_in_transit: The package is travelling to its destination. You may receive multiple updates of this type as the package travels to its destination.
description_customs_clearance: Your package is being processed by customs. If needed, you may be contacted for additional documentation, information or payment of duties/taxes. Please be prepared to provide requested details promptly.
description_return_to_sender: The package was not delivered and is now on its way back to the sender.
description_expired: The package has no tracking information for 30 days since it was created.
description_transit_limit_exceeded: The package has been in transit way longer than normal transit time allows. Please contact the carrier.
description_unsuccessful_delivery: Carrier attempted to deliver, but failed, and usually leaves a notice and will try to deliver again.
description_error: Unable to track this parcel due to technical issues. Please re-track.
description_exception: Customs hold or any shipping exceptions. Please contact the carrier.
description_available_for_pickup: The package is available for pickup from the carrier's facility.
no_numbers:
No information found.
Please try again with the correct data or contact customer support.
no_trackings:
Nothing yet :)
Your parcels will be displayed here
as soon as they are shipped.
